title: /restart指令无效, 崩溃重启无效.
txt_content:
输入/restart后服务器会关闭, 但不会再次启动.
以下是开服脚本(start.sh):
#!/bin/sh

screen -d -m -S server java -server -Xmx1536M -Xms1536M -Xss512K -Xaggressive -Xalwaysclassgc -XcompilationThreads1 -Xconmeter:dynamic -Xshareclasses -Xtune:virtualized -jar paper-51.jar复制代码

spigot.yml中已经设置:
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh复制代码

运行环境:
peper-51(1.15.1版本的paper端)

java version:
openjdk version "1.8.0_232"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_232-b09)
Eclipse OpenJ9 VM (build openj9-0.17.0, JRE 1.8.0 Linux amd64-64-Bit Compressed References 20191017_442 (JIT enabled, AOT enabled)
OpenJ9   - 77c1cf708
OMR      - 20db4fbc
JCL      - 97b5ec8f383 based on jdk8u232-b09)复制代码
